mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_mainboard(mb_name, mb_company, mb_socket, mb_chipset, mb_ramslot, mb_regdate, mb_price, mb_image) VALUES(#{mb_name},#{mb_company},#{mb_socket},#{mb_chipset},#{mb_ramslot},now(),#{mb_price},#{mb_image})
mapper.update: UPDATE p_mainboard SET mb_name = #{mb_name}, mb_company = #{mb_company}, mb_socket = #{mb_socket}, mb_chipset = #{mb_chipset}, mb_ramslot = #{mb_ramslot}, mb_price = #{mb_price}, mb_image = #{mb_image} WHERE mb_no = #{mb_no}
mapper.select: SELECT mb_socket FROM p_mainboard GROUP BY mb_socket asc ORDER BY mb_socket
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM p_mainboard WHERE mb_status=0 AND mb_socket like CONCAT('%', #{mb_socket})) p_main ORDER BY mb_socket,mb_ramslot,mb_price
